definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

Zhuge Liang (181-234), military leader and prime minister of Shu Han 蜀漢|蜀汉 during the Three Kingdoms period/the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius/mastermind
name of a place, Gezhouba Dam on the Changjiang River, in Sichuan
Changge county level city in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan
tuber of the kudzu vine (Pueraria lobata), used in Chinese medicine
Changge county level city in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan
a genius in retrospect (idiom); hindsight is 20-20

sentences.english: Grazia died in Egypt, far from her beloved Christophe.
sentences.chinese: 葛拉齐亚死在埃及，远离她所爱的克利斯朵夫。

sentences.english: Gerhardt ran his hand through his reddish brown hair distractedly .
sentences.chinese: 葛哈德只是发狂似地拿手挠他那红褐色的头发。

sentences.english: Siddhartha described to Govinda how he had moved away from selfish thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 悉达多向葛文达描述他如何摆脱了私欲。

sentences.english: I also believe that Greg was profoundly right about some big things.
sentences.chinese: 我还相信葛瑞格在一些大事上做得完全正确。

sentences.english: Gerhardt looked at him grimly , but did not answer.
sentences.chinese: 葛哈德狰狞地看了看他，却不回他的话。

sentences.english: Gorske is fairly thin, and his cholesterol level is low.
sentences.chinese: 葛罗斯克非常瘦，他体内的胆固醇含量很低。

sentences.english: Gregory's basic instruction is to draw anything and everything, whatever you like.
sentences.chinese: 葛瑞格利的基本理论是画任何你喜欢的事物。

sentences.english: GSK is entitled to amend these rules in its absolute discretion without prior notice.
sentences.chinese: 葛蘭素史克有权更改上列条款而无须预先通知。

sentences.english: Although Grazia and Christophe never married, they remained steadfast and consoling friends.
sentences.chinese: 虽然葛拉齐亚和克利斯朵夫两人从未结婚。

sentences.english: Papers talk about from four aspects of Ge's novel "local poetic flavour."
sentences.chinese: 论文从四个方面探讨葛水平小说的“乡土诗意”。

sentences.english: Mr. Wagoner and Mr. Gettelfinger didn't return messages seeking comment.
sentences.chinese: 瓦格纳和葛蒂尔芬格没有回复记者的置评请求。

sentences.english: Do you know why Grace didn't go to Rachel's birthday party?
sentences.chinese: 你知道为什么葛瑞斯没去参加瑞琪儿的生日晚会吗？

sentences.english: Graham-Cumming should consider a second volume of nerdy spots.
sentences.chinese: 葛兰姆康明应该考虑出版第二本怪胎景点。

sentences.english: Having left the house, I proceeded to do what Gregson had neglected.
sentences.chinese: 离开屋子以后，我就去做葛莱森疏忽未做的事了。

sentences.english: 'And it's not just Wenzhou, ' Mrs. Ge points out.
sentences.chinese: 葛树文指出，不只是温州这样。

sentences.english: Gregory’s basic instruction is to draw anything and everything, whatever you like. Bagels.
sentences.chinese: 葛瑞格利的基本理论是画任何你喜欢的事物。

definition: surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
refers to various monocotyledonous flowering plants including Acorus calamus and Typha orientalis/common cattail/bullrush
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
